website_summaries.verdict: If you're tired of the traditional dunk-and-swish method, consider this adjustable-force diaper sprayer. Its kink-free hose keeps the chore quick.
pros: Includes brass T-valve adapter, hose, wall mount, and hook holder
Easily removes thicker waste that results when solid food is introduced
cons: May leak, especially if water pressure is high
Be sure to turn off valve after each use, and consider turning down toilet water pressure

customer_reviews.title: I love this sprayer
customer_reviews.text: Uh-may-zing!! I love this sprayer. It has plenty of water pressure and makes my life much easier and cleaner. Action shot attached with my home made splatter shield:
customer_reviews.author: Renee D

customer_reviews.title: Simple to install, but will need extra o-rings to completely seal hose.
customer_reviews.text: The installation should have been fairly easy and straightforward. Unfortunately, both ends of the hose leaked. However, we needed a plumber to come by and check on some other things going on in our house and he graciously looked at the installation for us. Turns out that a simple extra rubber o-ring was needed on both ends of the hose, and this fixed the problem. Otherwise, it is as advertised. Simple to install, simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Camango Reader

customer_reviews.title: It rocks, we are keeping after potty training.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with the sole purpose of cleaning cloth diapers. It works really well for that, it has a strong stream of water gets poo out of the diaper quickly. It's also aesthetically pleasing. I waited for a while to review this, in case there was a problem. We use it for refilling our small fish tank, cleaning the toilet, hard to reach areas in the shower. Originally I planned to pass it on to another cloth diapering momma along with the diapers after potty training but now I can't give it up. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sara A.

customer_reviews.title: Developed a leak.
customer_reviews.text: We loved this sprayer for a short 11 months. It was perfect, until suddenly last week it developed a leak where the hose met the bottom of the sprayer handle. We followed the directions for the entirety of the sprayers life. Making sure to always turn off the water to the hose after each use, so definitely a quality issue.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Full of rust and leaking
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about this product and I set it up as soon as it was delivered. Unfortunately the nozzle must be used already because the inside is full of rust and it is continuously leaking. Not happy
customer_reviews.author: Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cloth Diapers
customer_reviews.text: About a month in, and this sprayer works really well. It was pretty easy to install with just a pair of adjustable pliers (Channelocks). Well, my toilet had a non-flexible hose on it that I had to replace also, but that wasn't a big deal. The water pressure is fantastic, and that might be my only quibble with it. It might actually be TOO powerful. That's easily remedied, though, with the adjustable lever. Also, holding the diaper a littler lower and closer to the water helps minimize splatter.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Field

customer_reviews.title: NOT A PERFECT SPRAYER AS OTHER REVIEWERS HAVE MENTIONED!
customer_reviews.text: I was REALLY hoping this full stain-less steel sprayer would not leak water droplets like every other bathroom sprayer I have used before, but THIS sprayer leaks even after I tried to re-tighten the spray head and recheck all connections. I can only assume other buyers of this item are just ignoring this issue or are unaware. Now you know and are warned.
customer_reviews.author: Geeks And Wireless

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy —Leaked After Only A Few Months
customer_reviews.text: What a huge disappointment. After only 5 months of light used, this hand held spray bidet from SmarterFresh developed a leak. I woke up one day with a big puddle of water on the bathroom floor and discovered, after a process of elimination, that the culprit wasn’t a leaking toilet, but this spray bidet. Apparently, the spray head is defective because of poor design and/or quality. Save your money and buy another brand with better reputation and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Siri

customer_reviews.title: two stars for looks
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and both started leaking within one year of using. Very disappointed as it is a good looking bidet. Edit: Within 24 hours of this review the owner contacted me and was super helpful in replacing two new hoses and one head to fix the problem free of cost. Changing the hose fixed my leaking and my bidets are again working great. It was very difficult to pinpoint initial leak on the hose as it seemed that whole of hose was leaking. I have never experienced such great customer service before. Recommended for looks and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: haasom

customer_reviews.title: Glad this exists but could be better
customer_reviews.text: This diaper sprayer is easy enough to install and use. It does the job and is very handy for rinsing cloth diapers in the toilet. I like that it hangs out of the way on the side of the toilet tank. This can also be used as a makeshift bidet if you're careful with your aim. The on/off switch is located in a really awkward place, and I always have to get a little too up-close-and-personal with the toilet bowl to find it. The stream is also *very* strong, so I have to make an effort not to accidentally spray poop all over the bathroom. Aside from these minor annoyances, I do recommend this diaper sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I got this and hooked it up for my wife so she can spray cloth diapers. We have had it for probably 18 months now and, after an additional child, we are still using it. Not only does it do exactly what it was advertised to do, but you can also use this to help clean your toilet or just use it as a spray hose for spraying anything off. I have even used this to spray things off of my tools (over the toilet) due to a bathroom remodel and it saved so much time having it right there. I definitely recommend this... plus it actually looks nice and not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Bum Gun
customer_reviews.text: I lived in Thailand for 10 years and learned to use what expats there call a bum gun which is a water sprayer used to clean your backside after you go number 2. I got hooked on them there because of how clean you feel afterward and how little paper you have to use to clean up. I've tried several since moving back to the US 6 years ago and I can easily say this is the best one I've found. You can easily select the desired pressure using the valve that comes with it plus that valve allows you to turn it off between uses which stops leaks that I've had with other units.
customer_reviews.author: Tom D

customer_reviews.title: The nozzle head started leaking after 9 months. I ...
customer_reviews.text: The nozzle head started leaking after 9 months. I could not stop or fix the nozzle head leak issue. Ruined my wood floor in the bathroom. Had to take it out. ***UPDATE: 1/29/2017: The vendor reached out to me after I posted the review and offered a replacement and ensured I was satisfied. This is unexpected and unsolicited by me so I was happy. Going to upgrade the rating to 3 stars as the vendor stands by their product.**
customer_reviews.author: I. Khan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product overall. Great build quality and materials. No leaks after installation. I ordered 3, installed 2 so far, and I am very happy with this product. Small form factor and easy to handle. Pretty reasonable price. Make sure you remember to turn off the valve under the tank after every use. This reduces the pressure on the valve in the bidet and keeps any leaks from happening. I strongly recommend this product based on my initial experience. I will update in a few months on how this product is doing.
customer_reviews.author: Techie

customer_reviews.title: Was great until ...
customer_reviews.text: Here it is 9 months later. The sprayer works very well .. but the hose not so much. The SS coil on the outside of the hose started to pull apart, the hose inside is very thin and burst shortly after. Now I have to find another as getting a replacement hose is next to impossible.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hank

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Maybe the one I got is defective, but I installed it and it leaks from both ends. Too late to return it though. Payed more for what I thought would be better too. Edit: I was contacted by the company right after I posted a review for the sprayer that was leaking. They sent the part out to replace the one that was leaking and (after finally finding the time to try installing it again, hello newborn!) it works great! So happy I decided to go with this sprayer, high quality, quick response to my grievance, and a warranty without grief (it's like the unicorn of diaper sprayers, ha!)
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: That Clean and Fresh Feeling!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for use as a bidet to use less paper and provide a cleaner experience after using the toilet. Works great, high pressure even when the value is only open 1/2. High pressure for cleaning off residue in the toilet or a cloth diaper, as it’s promoted for this task. Be sure to turn the valve off after each use (and I spray after to empty the hose). Solid metal spray nozzle, T-valve, and hose (with plastic inner hose inside).
customer_reviews.author: moc

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and no leakage
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it from Past 6 months and this is really good. I haven't noticed any leakage yet. We use it for our infants cloth diaper cleaning, regular bathroom usage (we use this Bidet Sprayer for our bathroom needs as we are used to clean ourselves with water from our birth, back in india). Overall a good product and more useful especially during this COVI time. Also you can save money using Bidet Sprayer instead of using Tissues for your bathroom needs.
customer_reviews.author: Naveen-suji

customer_reviews.title: It is  awesome
customer_reviews.text: This sprayer was easy to install. It took me 10 minutes. My wife and both love this sprayer. We actually replaced one she bought in the Philippines- the hose on that one was plastic and were concerned about it's poor quality. This one is all stainless steel and there is nothing negative I can think of about it. It is awesome. The unit has a valve that you can adjust the pressure and I will be buying the same sprayer for our second bath. This is something you should try if you have never had one. Oh so refreshing, clean, and saves a ton on toilet paper!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, No Leaks!
customer_reviews.text: I hooked this up to my toilet with zero issues and I'm not even close to a plumber. I haven't had any issues with leaking for the few weeks I've had it. It looks very nice on the side of the toilet. It is so helpful for cloth diapers, I honestly don't know why anyone would do the "dunk and swish" method when they could have a sprayer for less than $40. I got a splash shield as well but I don't think that's necessary and it could be homemade much cheaper than the $25 I spent on it. Overall, this is a great product and I would recommend it to anyone cloth diapering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job very well
customer_reviews.text: So it took me a lot longer then 10 min. to install, and I needed an adjustable wrench. The instructions on the placement of the washer was unclear, but finally figured it by trial and error, if the washers are not in the correct spot there will be a little leaking, but after finally getting it installed correctly I’m very pleased with the results and zero leaks. Been using it mostly as a bidet and I like how you have lots of control for the water pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Tim S

customer_reviews.title: $20 higher than current list price and it came with the wrong wall mount
customer_reviews.text: I overpaid for this item $75 here on Amazon just a month ago. Overall, I’m pleased with the quality of the product. But it came with the wrong Wall mount. Instead of the squarish one shown in the photos I got a round one and the ha duke doesn’t fit In it... at a premium price like this this is quite the oversight. There’s nobody to speak to at Amazon because of covid-19, hopefully a company rep could reach out and get me the right part...
customer_reviews.author: Hotbones

customer_reviews.title: I loved it, hubby didn't
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and use. Where we differed in opinion was with the water pressure. There must be a restrictor valve inside or something that makes the pressure of the water coming out very high. I liked this feature because it made spraying off all the poo on diapers really easy. Hubby however, thought it made too much of a mess with the spray being so strong. He even tried turning down the pressure to the line itsself but couldn't get it to lower enough for his liking. Maybe it's just our lines, but he prefers just rinsing them in the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme

customer_reviews.title: P.O.W.E.R.
customer_reviews.text: 5-stars for quality, durability, longevity, and water pressure! do you want to water-jet cut steel stock for your metal-art, look no further than this potty-sprayer. more powerful than a pressure washer for your poopiness. BONUS - it'll pressure-wash off the poop from your kids diaper NEGATIVE - the backsplash from the spray will send poopy water and chunks flying all over, the wall, your face, etc. don't even think about using it on your bits/bobs (tinkler and dinkler).
customer_reviews.author: LisaLedbelly

customer_reviews.title: Quality, easy to install and great!
customer_reviews.text: If you're cloth diapering and don't have this I don't know what you're doing. But really. You need this! This sprayer is great quality, super easy to install and has awesome pressure. It comes with easy to read, simple instructions. It has a valve that allows you tp turn it on and off so if you do have older kids you can shut off the water to it so they can't play with it. I am very happy with my purchase and would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Did not connect with my toilet
customer_reviews.text: This did not work with my toilet and my toilet is not old or special. The T valve is not long enough for the flexible tube my toilet has. I emailed the company because it says all over the instructions that they are here to help, but got no reply. I bought this too long ago to return it and now have to dunk and scrape diapers until we can figure something out. TEST ON YOUR TOILET before return period lapses. This does not work with all toilets.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and does the job!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third sprayer we got. The first 2 (from a different brand) stopped working/leaked less than a year. We've had this for over six months now and there are no issues. The build quality is much better than previous ones we've had - the metal head feels super sturdy. I think the key to extending the life of these sprayers is to close the valve after every use (which is recommended in the instructions). Otherwise the water pressure over time will cause the head to leak. It's super easy to install and doesn't require any extra tools.
customer_reviews.author: shawkster

customer_reviews.title: We have other children who like to play with things
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my baby shower and wow. It looks SO sleek. It can hang over the toilet tank or be mounted to the wall. I set it up in less than 5 minutes with only one tool. This is POWERFUL! I even cleaned the inside of the toilet bowl with it. Stream is adjusted with how much you open the valve so it can be a light or strong stream. We have other children who like to play with things, but the valve is pretty much hidden so they can’t. It is located at the connector and is small.
customer_reviews.author: Moriah Frasier

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until I flooded my house
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for us to clean my sons diapers for about 7 months until we woke up one morning to the sound of running water and upon investigation found that the hose had broken and water was gushing out everywhere. We had flooding in the bathroom and halls and water went through the walls into the floors of the adjacent bedrooms. We spent hours ensuring the area would dry completely and we are hoping mold doesn’t start growing. Had this not happened I’d give a 5 star review but there is an issue with the quality and the durability of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: like incredible hulk tighten
customer_reviews.text: Previous sprayer we had started to leak (different brand) so I thought I'd give this one a try. When first installed it leaked where the handle and the hose connected. Took it apart and one of the washers was not fitted down in the hose correctly. Positioned the washer correctly and hasn't leaked since. You really have to tighten the connection of the hose to the sprayer, like incredible hulk tighten. Have been using it for a couple weeks now and has not leaked a drop. Excellent pressure too!
customer_reviews.author: Keila

customer_reviews.title: Hard to remember to close the valve - buy a different product
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the product was easy to install, has high water pressure, attaches nicely to the top of commode etc. However, the baby's caretakers (me, nanny, grandma etc) have to remember to close the valve other than just stopping the sprayer after "EVERY" use. This seems easy at first, however never happens "EVERY" time. I have to keep reminding them every month to close it after each use. I have used sprayers in the past in other countries like Thailand etc where I didn't have to close the additional valve. If I were to buy again, I will do more research to find a product that doesn't require me to perform this additional step.
customer_reviews.author: babe-abe

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We love this product. It’s fantastic just let’s out cold water only because that’s how our apartment is but still works great especially in the times when all the stores are out of toilet paper this is fantastic. I originally got it for washable diapers but it came in handy for other uses.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend - easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Installs easily, just as advertised. Still requires a basic understanding of plumbing to install and water will always leak out of the toilet tank when the hose is disconnected. This is normal. After installation, no leaking. The on/off valve allows some degree of flow regulation and the hose and components seem well manufactured. Only 4 stars because the sprayer has a very awkward fit into the holder which hangs from the toilet tank. It doesn't fit snugly, flops around, and feels like it will fall out. Minor annoyance and concern, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Will Keim

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.....except for the leaking.
customer_reviews.text: This is our second sprayer from this company. Installed two of them in two bathrooms. We are careful to shut off the water at the water supply after each use, and then purge the hose and sprayer so that there is no residual pressure after use. However, The one we purchased in 2017 is now beginning to leak at the handle. When squeezed, the spray shoots in unpredictable streams from both the front and aft portions of the handle. When sitting idle, it leaks from the handle area. We love this product and would like to simply purchase a replacement handle if possible. Could you message me and assist in making arrangments? Thanks so much. Nick
customer_reviews.author: Nix

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, gets diapers clean
customer_reviews.text: I am not a handy person. I have succesyavoided being handy my whole life. So when I ordered this product my one hope was that it’s installation would not require “handiness”. It did not! I installed this product to my toilet in like 7 minutes. Instructions were straight forward and easy to follow, and the product itself was designed with ease of installation in mind. IF THAT’S NOT ENOUGH FOR YOU, I will say that the product works wonderfully. I haven’t tried any other diaper sprayers, but this one does the job and does it well. Great pressure, so I high that I’d suggest a water shield because without one I’m sure there’d be a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Cranmer Family

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, but leaked immediately from spray head connector. Didn’t feel any resistance when screwing this part together, don’t think the threaded male end was putting much contact pressure on the seal before the shoulder seated. Replaced with a thicker washer and at least temporarily it has stopped the leak. I used the included PTFE tape on the connections though no mention to do so in the instructions. This not a cheap kit, looks good but poor design/quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Gallus1

customer_reviews.title: Leaks consistently from multiple parts!  Water Damage and mold remediation is not fun!
customer_reviews.text: I'm tired of people who write Amazon reviews of items fresh out of the box. This thing is poorly made and leaks--from the nozzle, the hose, you name it. You fix one part and the other parts leak. All it takes is one time and then you have water damage and may need mold remediation. It's not worth the risk! There are other sprayers on here with a lifetime warranty. Get those instead of wasting your time with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product! Just started cloth diapering our newborn twins and had to buy this because, well, that’s a lot of poop! Works great - great pressure, does what it is supposed to do. My husband installed it easily and quickly and said it’s very good quality (and he’s picky!). May buy another for the other bathroom if we decide we need one on the other floor of the house.
customer_reviews.author: MFranny

customer_reviews.title: starts to leak from the top.
customer_reviews.text: It looks a high quality product at the beginning. In deed, I had given it five stars when I bought it first. But after a while, it started to leak from the top. So far, I bought three of this product during the last two years. After 6-7 month of use, it starts to leak from the top. I'm not going to pay 40 bucket again to have it for less than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Amirkh

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sprayer
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was very nice and professional. Instructions are simple, though the install process is rather simple, so no surprise. Everything went together well with only hand-tightening (granted I have a strong grip). I would recommend using some teak tape just to ensure a good seal. The T-Valve works smoothly to fine tune how much pressure goes to the handle, and the handle has an easy lever to press with the thumb to also control the pressure. Overall, I would buy again and would also recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Draddots

customer_reviews.title: Easy install came with an extra gasket that threw me ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy install came with an extra gasket that threw me off. I uninstalled the whole thing to double check my gaskets. The pressure is great for a house that doesn't have great pressure. We generally use it with the spray pal then we let the spray pal & diaper dry a bit before putting it in the bin. You can use this without the spray pal also if you have the right bowl/water level. I have sprayed against the edge of the toilet very carefully. Good product easy install good design. Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Innovative and practical.
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful gadget. My wife had me order this and it's pretty impressive how easy it was to install and use. Turn off your water supply to your pot, drain the tank by holding down the flusher, get a small pan to catch excess water from under the supply, detach supply line and attach this fancy Jose', reattach supply line and bam! You got yourself a built in poo sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: opepimpston

customer_reviews.title: lost screws...
customer_reviews.text: The screws that hold the spray are always loose and lost...I dont know if i want to recommend this to others, but everyone who visits our home enquire about these, we had ordered 5 of these and 3 of them has lost screws...
customer_reviews.author: ABDUL MAHMAD

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, very useful
customer_reviews.text: My husband wasn’t sold in getting this, however he now loves it. We haven’t even started using cloth diapers yet and have still found uses for it. I have used it to spray solids off of laundry, clean the toilet, as well as give my dog a bath (we have no tub, only a standup shower next to the toilet). It has lots of pressure (which is great!) so just be careful to go easy on it to avoid splash back.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last
customer_reviews.text: Updated 6/11: After writing my previously 1-star review, the seller reached out to me on a Sunday to rectify the issue. Kevin sent me another spray head and said it sounded like the issue with my first sprayer was a spring gone bad. With the replacement, I noticed it looks and feel different. It certainly acts different too! WOWZA, it sprays REALLY HARD! I'm pretty sure it is better than it was before, new! Worked very well for just over a year, now the water is a mere trickle. We have to unscrew the head every time we use it and then it sprays for a little before it trickles again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: good sprayer and good company
customer_reviews.text: I have happily used this sprayer on cloth diapers for a little over a year and a half. The hose split on me last weekend, probably from my own error (didn't know until now reading reviews here that you need to turn it off at the base when not in use). I contacted the company about getting just the hose replaced and the owner immediately and graciously offered to send me a new hose and I just got it yesterday and set it up (BTW it has has such an easy set up, just make sure every seal is tight). Everything is great and it sprays like a dream again.
customer_reviews.author: Jett L.

customer_reviews.title: Loved! Luxury!
customer_reviews.text: Exclusively cloth diapered 2 kids. Used with second and felt like it was a luxury. Easy to spray. Product allowed me to squeeze just a little to control spray intensity. Will be using with any baby after. PS: we did not spray while exclusive breast milk. It disolves in water, so just did a prewash then the usual detergent wash. But once you add anything else to the gut... sprayer was a nice tool!
customer_reviews.author: Nanvey

customer_reviews.title: This thing is powerful!
customer_reviews.text: Really does the job. I use it with the SprayPal & my diapers are cleaned thoroughly, very quickly, with NO mess. Also a nice bidet, but the pressure is so strong you should be careful using it for that purpose, haha. Easy install (I did it myself in 10 minutes while my husband made dinner), worked great right out of the box. The instructions were clear. And the seller/manufacturer followed up to see how I liked it. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Baby AB

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Makes emptying my grandmothers ostomy bag so much easier. It’s important to find things to make your life easier, so that you’re not struggling to do something that is required of you. Especially when that something is a daily requirement. We can now smile and tell others that we found something that makes things a lot easier. First heard about the sprayers when I was cloth diaper my now toddler. I didn’t believe the hype, but I know now, that I missed out on a product that would’ve helped make things easier for me.
customer_reviews.author: LACEE D LOVELY

customer_reviews.title: Too powerful
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think that being too powerful would be a downfall for me but it is. I do like the sprayer overall and it efficiently cleans our cloth diapers. My husband's favorite part is the length is substantial enough to clean our bathtub! The biggest issue we have though, is the spray is so powerful that water shoots all over the bathroom (after bouncing off diaper or toilet bowl) which has me concerned for sanitary reasons.
customer_reviews.author: K. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Incredible product! I did cloth diapers before, for ...
customer_reviews.text: Incredible product! I did cloth diapers before, for my now 12 and 14 yo- but this is a game changer for our precious new bundle! Installation time by my partner Scott, a marine engineer, was faster and easier than my last pre-bedtime nursing session. Came in less than 2 days (Prime). Thrilled! Love this for cleaning the solids off our cloth diapers. To double as a kind of bidet, it would be truly great (5 stars) if there was some kind of optional inline mini water heater.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah McGann

customer_reviews.title: Inconvenient
customer_reviews.text: We on a bidet for our guest bathroom that is similar but has all steel parts. When this arrived there was a warning that said turn it off at the valve every time you use it. Sorry, but that is not even practical, and there ar better products out there. We sent it back and searched for our original product.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A. G

customer_reviews.title: Broken after three months
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with SmarterFresh's excellent customer service. I wrote a negative review detailing how the first sprayer I bought broke after three months, and Kevin, the owner of the company, personally reached out to let me know he sent a replacement sprayer. He was quite helpful and insisted that I didn't need to return the defective unit--a welcome break for a busy cloth-diapering mama. I recommend this product and this company. It's rare to receive such quality customer service, and I couldn't be more pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ForestMama

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was our second sprayer, and this one works perfectly! I installed it myself in under 15 minutes. I had a leaking issue where the hose connected to the toilet, but my husband loosened it a bit, turns out it was just over tight. The water pressure varies on the amount of pressure you squeeze the trigger with. The full blast is STRONG and will take anything off. I'd suggest a spray guard.
customer_reviews.author: samanthaxrandom

customer_reviews.title: but so far it works brilliantly. It literally shoots the poop right into the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this for a week, but so far it works brilliantly. It literally shoots the poop right into the toilet. This has made the horror of solid food poop diapers fun! Well, maybe not fun, but definitely less daunting :) it also works great on those occcasional blowouts. It was very easy to install, and as long as you make sure to tighten all the nuts you won't have any leaks. It arrived on time and the packaging was secure. The low profile nozzle and the fact that it hooks to your toilet make storage a breeze, so breezy in fact that you might forget that you are doing diapers at all!
customer_reviews.author: Meghalodon

customer_reviews.title: Great Sprayer
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous based on the lack of reviews and the cheaper price, but this sprayer works great. The power is a bit touchy, but with a gentle touch, it works just fine. You might want to use some sort of sprayer cover around the diaper so that the water that inevitably splashes off the diaper doesn't get all over your bathroom, but you need that for any sprayer anyways, so it's not a defect in this one. It attached very easily and is really great for getting the poop off the diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin D.

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal Customer Service! Works great too!
customer_reviews.text: World class customer support! We had an issue with the sprayer leaking at the t valve and left a poor review. We were immediately contacted by Kevin, the owner of SmarterFresh, who helped us to no end in order to ensure we were satisfied. In the end, I suspect it may have been a problem with our equipment that was causing the leak, yet he still provided amazing customer service to help us figure that out. Now that we have it working, it works great! Lots of water pressure. If you're in the market for a cloth diaper sprayer, or anything else SmarterFresh sells, I couldn't recommend them any higher.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Cloth Diaper Sprayer Fails before 1 year.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy setup with great instructions. Great water pressure for cleaning off cloth diapers. Came quickly and was shipped in a nice box. Overall, it is a great product from the start. Will recalculate later down the road for how it holds up over time. Well, just a little under a year later after installing it, it seems that some sort of o-ring gave out at the bottom of the sprayer itself. It started flooding our bathroom and doesn't seem to be fixable as I can't see a way to take apart the sprayer and replace it. It was good while it lasted but could have been a real disaster had we been on vacation or something.
customer_reviews.author: SSS

customer_reviews.title: No leaks, looks great, wife loves. What else is needed?
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I could build a DIY one for my wife for less, but I can't get this stainless steel look for less. My wife loves it. We cloth diaper and this has made cleaning diapers a breeze. Even I don't mind rinsing out diapers with this tool. It has never leaked. Our home has a master bath and one other bathroom shared by the rest of the home. Since technically it's a guest bath as well, we want to make sure it looks tidy. The look f this sprayer is nice. I recommend this to any families who want a good look for a diaper sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: So easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and performs so well! It took my husband a quick 10 minutes to install this, and voila it was ready to go. It sprayed with a good amount of strength, perfect for some of the tough stools that takes some effort getting out. The only downside with cloth diaper sprayers is that you will splatter water everywhere. I do like how you can control how strong the water pressure is by controlling the lever. On full force, you get exactly that, a full force of water bouncing all over the toilet. Other than that, having this diaper sprayer is the perfect addition to any cloth diapering system!
customer_reviews.author: S. NgoTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Life time warranty + best sprayer + unbelieveable customer service
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for quite a long time and this sprayer is superb, I would say life saver. More than the sprayer I got impressed with the customer service. Any issues just shoot and email. Team is so quick in responding and resolving the issues. One of the part was not working and I sent email to the support they sent me a new part and boom it was quickly delivered and easy to assemble and started working again. Don't think, trust me just go ahead and buy this awesome thing. Thanks Gil (SmarterFresh team)
customer_reviews.author: MHadi

customer_reviews.title: Watch the video!
customer_reviews.text: Got this due to shortage of TP at the onset of covid-19. It’s awesome, and has a low learning curve for those of you who are wondering- it’s easy! At first I was confused about what order to place the washers and bolts in, which ones on top and which underneath. The video on the same page right above the Q&As was from a different brand so I initially ignored it for that reason. I decided to view it and the parts are identical, easy least from there on.
customer_reviews.author: MIMIOTO

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for about a month and a half. I don't know if we could do cloth diapers without it! This is the only sprayer I have ever used, so I don't know how it compares to any others. But the pressure is amazing and it takes up little space ( which is important to us, as we have a small bathroom and also have a bidet attachment ). This is also handy for spraying marks off of the toilet bowl. I haven't had to use the scrub brush since we got it.
customer_reviews.author: slimes

customer_reviews.title: Lasting product, exceptional customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Edit: I originally hated the product because the head leaked everywhere upon installation. I left a very detailed and frustrated review. The company (without any prompting from me) sent me a replacement head right away and apologized for the faulty product. We haven't had a leak since. It's over a year later, and I am taking the time to edit because this is a quality product and I am so pleased with it. It is a game changer for cloth diapering poops. I also use it to clean the tub/shower and it makes it so much easier!.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: If you have a leak Kevin will help. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Updated Review. (2 stars - 5 stars) Kevin reached out and help me with my issue and sent a new hose and sprayer head. They are working perfectly. Customer service like that will have me coming back to his company for my lavatory needs. Thanks Kevin. The sprayer started leaking at the hose connection. After adding additional orings and seals, it has only slowed down just a little bit. It seems to be a machining issue on the threads.
customer_reviews.author: Nick H.

customer_reviews.title: YAAAS!
customer_reviews.text: You guys, this sprayer is the best. It was so easy to install and even easier to use. I have this sprayer and the Aquaus SprayMate Cloth Diaper Sprayer Splatter Shield, and these two items together are making cleaning my baby's cloth diapers so easy. I actually told my husband that I get excited when there's a diaper to rinse out. Seriously. If you are cloth diapering, spend the money and get this sprayer and the splatter shield and ENJOY. :)
customer_reviews.author: e-lane

customer_reviews.title: Great sprayer!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and sits conveniently on side of the toilet without being in the way. It is good quality and looks nice. Works really well for cleaning out cloth diapers. The harder you squeeze it, the higher the water pressure. Just be careful if you drop it. I may have sprayed our ceiling. Now that’s some strong water pressure! Haha!
customer_reviews.author: Kayleen Brown-Eddings

customer_reviews.title: Great sprayer
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this sprayer for 3 years, it worked fantastic. Enough force to get my diapers super clean. I line finally called it quits in the kink where it rested, I contacted the company and they had fantastic customer service and are sending a new line out to me right away.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Iacovino

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Easy installation. No issues
customer_reviews.text: I love our diaper sprayer. I live in an apartment and talked to them before installing. They insisted that their men come install in to reduce liability on me if a pipe burst or something. Installation took 15 mins. And the sprayer is extremely strong and effective on our cloth. It has a toggle to turn the water on and off. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: High quality at a bargain price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product at a bargain price. It is very high quality and performs much better than higher priced units we have previously purchased on Amazon - we use this as a bidet wand and we connected an in-line water filter with no issues other than obtaining the additional plumbing adapters at a local hardware store. Also, contrary to other reviews, this unit does NOT leak if you take the few minutes necessary to read the instructions and properly install it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. G

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I don't know if it's the sprayer or our water pressure but it can spray hard. I usually press the handle lightly for a lighter spray. And remember to turn the valve off and release the water in hose after every use. And I love the handy handle that goes on the tank.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a little bit of plumber’s tape to get it to fit the pipes on our toilet, but overall was easily installed and is holding up well. The water pressure is easily adjusted and the sprayer is comfortable to use. The construction seems of high quality, it doesn’t look bulky or out of place in our bathroom at all. I wanted this specifically to use as both a handheld bidet and to rinse off feminine products like reusable cotton pads and menstural cups.
customer_reviews.author: Mia G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I’m female and decently handy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I’m female and decently handy. This product was super easy to install, about 10 minutes including reading over the directions. Great finish on the product and it has a good strong stream for rinsing. Came with good quality gaskets, which I was expecting to have to replace before install. Just a side note for those who aren’t so handy, you’ll have to remove the two plastic covers and the blue screw inserts on the hose line. The directions don’t state that.
customer_reviews.author: Ainslee Wingate

customer_reviews.title: Fixed!!
customer_reviews.text: Update: Customer service is amazing!!! They made it right by refunding my money and giving me a replacement hose. I am very pleased and would not hesitate to buy from them again. I would give this an excellent review if the water didn't drip out of the hose part when you're using it. This happened on the first one of these we bought. I didn't report it or try to get a refund because i thought it was just worn out from almost a year of use. I bought a new one, assuming it was just worn out from almost a year of use But now, it's happening again and I have no clue how to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Andromeda V.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: We received this item today and we're excited for using it with our cloth diapers. We purchased a different brand in the past but we left it at our previous house. We went with this option because of the ability to hang it on the back of the toilet instead of attatching it to the wall. The hose hooked up great and the sprayer works awesome! The hook for the toilet had holes that were too small for the screws provided. I contacted the seller and the same day they sent out a new holder and screws Priority Mail. Wonderful customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Loeffler

customer_reviews.title: Love that I can control the stream by squeezing the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's the only one I've ever had so I can't compare it to anything else, but it does just what it should! Love that I can control the stream by squeezing the trigger looser or tighter. It does spray everywhere with the forceful stream, as I'm sure any strong spray would. My husband connected it and said it was super easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service ethic
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the diaper sprayer (bidet). The quality of the hardware was above my expectations. Especially for the price. After a year and a half the hose developed a leak. Upon contacting the company to inquire about BUYING a replacement I was pleasantly surprised to find that this company has a high standard for where their money is made. I was sent a replacement at NO CHARGE and I couldn't be more pleased. I can't help but highly recommend Smarter Fresh for your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Love this and can't live without!
customer_reviews.text: We didn't cloth diaper for very long because we are a family of 6 and two of our 4 kids are in diapers and that was waaaay too much work and laundry for us....BUT the best thing to come out of us trying cloth diapering is we got this sprayer for the dirty diapers. We don't use this for diapers anymore but we use it on ourselves after using the restroom and we absolutely cannot live without this! It's so easy to clean dirty bums now and it's waaaay more sanitary that just wiping with tp. Great product, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Philharmonic6

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous poop sprayer!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it a day and I’m already loving it. It looks really expensive. The sprayer is solid and easy to use by depressing the lever to control the water pressure. I set it up myself and I’m no handyman. Definitely glad I purchased this sprayer for my cloth diapers this go around. I had the BumGenius sprayer 5 years ago, so this isn’t my first sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: R. L. Staten

customer_reviews.title: Used to love it...
customer_reviews.text: We started using this in April after our baby was born, and loved it up until yesterday. Our whole bathroom floor was flooded and we realized it was because the nozzle of the sprayer started leaking. Husband thinks the seal isn't sealing properly. If you pull the handle back far enough it will sometimes stop, but we're bummed. Used it as directed multiple times a day but thought it would last us longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: I have used bidet spray in the past. This one for sure better than bidet. Valve has a true control of water pressure meaning instead of on/off it gradually controls the water pressure per your need. Additionally the spray handle also helps to control the water pressure. Installation is better because you don't need to worry about putting washers on both sides of the hose. Great product and I will highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: tau hus

customer_reviews.title: Need a Spray shield
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to assemble but my god there is some power behind it.. which us awesome when spraying diapers clean, but not so awesome if you don't want splatter on your floor. This with the combination of the spray shield I bought after the fact makes me very happy with my cloth diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: Powerful water pressure!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! There are many similar sprayers out there. Chose this one due to just number of review. Was super easy to install. Following the recommendation to NOT leave it on all of the time. Must shut it off between uses. There is A LOT of water pressure which is the point to spray down the diapers which works beautifully. The one time I forgot and left it on there were simply needs of water on the sprayer nozzle but no dripping. You will remember after doing it once.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy a 3 yo can do it.
customer_reviews.text: Install is a breeze - I even pulled it off with my 3 yo “helping”! Also it blasts off the poop. The shut off valve at the supply is much faster & simpler than a cheap plastic one I installed in our old house so we actually use it. I blast diaper poop using a Spray Pal - I hold the spray pal and the hose below the handle while my 3 yo has a ball squeezing the sprayer and sweeping it around.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon K

customer_reviews.title: So far the best I have ever seen
customer_reviews.text: These are so far the best bidet I have every installed and I install a lot of those. The have a great quality solid metal spray. Best quality I have ever seen. The hose and the valve is also good quality, I have used similar valve befor I know they last a long time and they look great. I had no leak problems with this product. I just installed 2 let see how long they will last. Usually the spray break first and then the hose. I will upgrade this review as they break. So as long as I did not upgrade means they didn't break.
customer_reviews.author: Sinole

customer_reviews.title: Superior piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have no plumbing experience, but even with taking our time, we completed it in under 20 minutes without issue. We did use plumbing tape even though it wasn't specifically called for. It's working perfectly and we consider it a great purchase. It's obvious to see that it is a superior piece of equipment. We expect many years of use. Regarding turning it off after every use, I've put up a little sticky note to remind us until it becomes automatic. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Just finished installing this for our little guy coming in November. I did a lot of research before buying because I hate spending money on something and end up regretting the purchase. Pros: Seems to be very high quality out of the box. Instructions are clear. Parts are sturdy and have necessary o-rings to prevent leaks. I like having control of the flow both with the shutoff valve and the sprayer handle. Cons: The sprayer seems to catch a little when taking it off the holder. Nothing extreme, but it could be annoying over time. Happy so far, but I may have more feedback once we start spraying diapers with it later this year. Will update if necessary!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Perry

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install and Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product with a matt finish and solid build material. Appearance: The look of the product good with a matt finish that looks quite elegant with a well-carved handle. Quality: The product feels solid in hand and can withstand high pressure. Installation: The installation was very easy with the detailed instruction given in the manual. I haven't used any tools and done it all by myself. Experience: I have been using this from the past one week and haven't observed any issue.
customer_reviews.author: Lovey23

customer_reviews.title: Changed my review
customer_reviews.text: After about one year of using it, one morning I found the bathroom full of water. The hose of this product was entirely damaged and water was coming out through its different parts. Overall, it seems a good product at first but it has a short life.
customer_reviews.author: Mall Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, easy to use! I installed this about a month ago, so my family could use it before the birth of my son. It is simple enough that our eight and six year old daughters can use it. The water pressure is great and it doesn't leak at all. Very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Manning

customer_reviews.title: Don't dunk, spray.
customer_reviews.text: After 4 years of cloth diapers, we finally broke down and bought a Diaper Sprayer! Oh boy, we were really missing out. This sprayer is awesome! It makes cleaning the diaper so much easier. We won't go back now. Installation is really easy and it does not leak if installed correctly. You can adjust the spray volume with the lever on the tank and the sprayer hangs on the side of the toilet, for easy reach. Over all, this is a great unit at a great value and I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mindless

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The directions to install this were incredibly easy to follow, and I am certainly no master plumber. It only took me about 15 minutes. I purchased this because I am starting to make the transition to cloth diapering for my baby girl. I read this is a must-have, and I must agree. This has definitely made cleaning off those dirty diapers a breeze. Water pressure is excellent, materials seem high quality. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Needs better holder attachment.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sprayer has very good pressure if you get to install it right. We had some leaking issues at first but its fine now. However i rate the holder attachment a ZERO, the sprayer keeps falling down from the holder and its very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: I started using these while in Thailand and now feel like a barbarian not having one whenever I use the ...
customer_reviews.text: If you want a little shower down under ever time you use the bathroom, well this is your thing. I started using these while in Thailand and now feel like a barbarian not having one whenever I use the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Trowski

customer_reviews.title: Works great, feels expensive, lots of pressure
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and just installed it. Installation was a bit tricky because my toilet is very close to the wall. I had a minute where I thought it wouldn't work, but I managed to install it. I am using it as a bidet and am impressed with how much pressure I can get (easy to press more or less for more or less pressure). If you are looking for a hand-held bidet, don't hesitate on this one.
customer_reviews.author: LittleRedCat

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Where do I start? This things is AWESOME! It's obviously good quality, good materials, excellent fit and finish. Easy to install and have been using it for a couple years now with zero leaks or any funny business. Best part is - the thumb lever is not an on/off full blast sort of thing. It lets you adjust the water pressure with your thumb very easily. VERY IMPORTANT depending on the consistency of the poop you are trying to spray off of your baby's cloth diapers (TMI? My bad). Good price too. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MKPVL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cleaning our cloth diapers!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sprayer! I read enough reviews to make sure and turn the valve off after every use which is freaking simple! It's no different than turning off a light switch. I use this amazing sprayer and then I turn it off and then I squeeze the sprayer one more time to relieve pressure!
customer_reviews.author: AuthenticallyT

customer_reviews.title: Product itself appears solid and well made. I used ...
customer_reviews.text: Product itself appears solid and well made. I used plumbers tape to install on all connections. However, I've noticed that the pressure to the nozzle needs to reduced to about 20%, otherwise the nozzle itself starts to drip. This points to a quality issue within the nozzle itself.
customer_reviews.author: Aamer Akhter

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service, Beautiful sprayer
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful sprayer. I've had it a few months and so far its a wonderful bidet sprayer, its so adjustable. When I first installed it, it leaked so I got in touch with the seller and was sent a new hose part. Now I'm spraying to my hearts content.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Grand Grand

customer_reviews.title: Essential tool for cloth-diapering.  Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: If you are cloth diapering, this is a must-have item. No one wants to “dunk and swish” and this sprayer is like a mini power washer. Easy to adjust pressure; easy install; effective poo removal; convenient toilet hook; sleek and inconspicuous. Lastly, I had this for about 9 months and my hose started leaking. I got in touch with the company and they shipped me a new hose, no questions asked, within 3 days. Fantastic customer service. I only wish I had it from day one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
